parameters.value: {'name': 'admin新增加客户', 'request': {'method': 'post', 'path': '/api/admin/wallet/add', 'headers': {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (HTML, like Gecko) ""Chrome/54.0.2840.99 Safari/537.36', 'deviceId': '1254', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'token': '$amintoken'}, 'params': {'userName': '$PhoneMain', 'nickName': '$updatenickName', 'actualAmt': '$actualAmt', 'couponAmt': '$couponAmt', 'remark': '!@#$%^&*()_+/*-+0123457Qwqeer提前淘汰请求他v《。；、。/,./;\\[][]【】{}:"|>?<'}, 'validate': [{'equal_to': {'$.code': 1}}]}}
